title: Flight Simulator 2020  - Addon spotlight - Hawker Hurricane MKI - version 1.0.7
description:
In this video we will look at the Hawker Hurricane MKI which has been recently updated to a new version.  Since nothing has changed on the exterior besides the smoke feature we will have a look at the changes inside before we are trying a short flight.

If you also want to give this aircraft a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/23757/hawker-hurricane-mkii
